issue.title: www.nikc.nikon.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.nikc.nikon.com/event/ing/view/621](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nikc.nikon.com%2Fevent%2Fing%2Fview%2F621) ### Comment > Browser did not show alert message to confirm my action. > > Reproduction Step. > > 1. Log-in > 2. Click a button in red circle > 3. You can see a modal page > 4. Fill all necessary fields > 5. Click a bottom button to finish > 6. Click '확인'(yes in English) on alert message > 7. It should show next alert message to address all steps are finished.(But this step did not work) Username: `@pelennor` ### Screenshots
